DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate combination therapy micropulse diode laser treatment show non inferiority visual acuity within 12 month comparison standard therapy ( intravitreal injection ranibizumab ) .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Standard Lucentis Therapy With Micropulse Diode Laser Treatment Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis nonischemic diabetic macular edema result reduction visual functionality determination best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) , ophthalmologic investigation , SDOCT , FAG anamnesis BCVA 0.05 0.6 retinal thickness > 300 Âµm determine SDOCT The informed consent form must sign study specific test procedures do Confirmation subject 's health insurance coverage prior first screen visit Age least 18 year ( inclusive ) first screen visit Ability understand follow studyrelated instruction Severe ischemic maculopathy study eye Active neovascularization iris retina study eye History intravitreal injection VEGFinhibitor steroid study eye within last 3 month Pathologies anterior segment study eye reduce visual acuity ( e.g . corneal opacification , advanced cataract ) Advanced glaucoma central defect visual field study eye Retinal pathology reduce visus ( e.g . central scar , age relate macular degeneration ) study eye Retinal vascular occlusion medical history study eye Active suspect ocular periocular infection Active intraocular inflammation study eye Intraocular surgery study eye within last 6 month Laser therapy study eye within last 6 month Systemic steroid therapy within last 3 month HbA1c > 10 % Systolic blood pressure 170 mmHg diastolic blood pressure 110 mmHg ( least 3 min supine position ) Pregnant breastfeed woman woman without adequate method contraception .
